message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR. 

The paper proposes a novel attention mechanism for image captioning, which is a task related to computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The method involves integrating image topics as a guiding information, which can be seen as a form of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also involves extracting image features and topics with separate networks, which can be seen as a form of information retrieval (cs.IR).
